name: Strategic Simulation of the Battle of Gallipoli
name_original: Strategic Simulation of the Battle of Gallipoli
description: This game has been made in around a week for a History project regarding WW1 and the Ottomans. The game currently contains bugs and, it would be in its alpha. If I find this project worth continuing outside of a History project, I might fix the bugs, although for now, it will remain the same.
